name: Energy of Life
description:
This is a life simulator, where you use passion ,reason, strength as your energy, throw them in the demand panel ,and simply roll, and enjoy the music

The gameplay is inspired by cultist simulator

Thanks for playing, this game's still updating events(currently there is 25 total)

design and develop by holyevans for go-godot-jam-2

music:

www.bensound.com
